<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="">[Guided Introspection](/Spells.aspx?ID=1259)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 73</row>

**Domain**
[Introspection](/Domains.aspx?ID=60)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You guide the target in examining their innermost feelings, their behaviors, and the motivations behind their actions, granting them clarity and insight. The target gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) and [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68).

 If the target would become [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), they reduce the duration of the confused condition by 1 round, to a minimum of 1 round. If the target would become [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37), they reduce the value of the frightened or stupefied condition by 1, to a minimum of 1. Once any of these conditions occur, the spell ends.

---
**Heightened (+3)** The status bonus increases by 1.
name: Guided Introspection
